The Access to Baby Formula Act will provide and support our most vulnerable families, by improving WIC participants‚Äô access to safe formula products.

And the @AppropsDems Supplemental Funding Legislation will get the FDA the resources it needs to address this shortage right now.

Parents are being confronted by empty shelves as they try to find safe and affordable baby formula for their children.

That is why tonight, I voted to pass two bills to address this shortage & help prevent it from ever happening again. #FeedOurInfants https://t.co/N9X41C5Y9Y

And he's back again!

The @NatlParkService ensures that our iconic national parks, recreation areas, historic monuments, and so much more are protected and conserved for years to come. Join me for @AppropsDems hearing to oversee their budget requests: https://t.co/4kjG3pyr77 https://t.co/lokqSpm7RC

I led a letter with @CongressmanRaja to urge President Biden & @CommerceGov to move swiftly and take these concerns into account. https://t.co/prKIA5u5C9

Happy 25th Anniversary to @NewDemCoalition!

Gridlock, partisanship, politics as usual. For 25 years, New Dems have been fighting those faults to produce good policy and get stuff done. Proud to be a #NewDem. #25YearsofNewDems https://t.co/WLhzJmFtRa

But it's started a conversation that we need to have to expand access to care for all. I'm looking forward to continuing to work alongside our dedicated mental health professionals to find and enact solutions. https://t.co/OVpxRmAe1t

PASSED: The House voted to pass my bill as part of the Workforce Innovation & Opportunity Act!

Americans are getting back to work, but employers are looking for workers with the right skills for the job. This bill will fill in the gaps in workforce development.

My heart goes out to the friends, loved ones, & communities who are mourning the lives lost in Buffalo in a horrific act of hate-fueled gun violence.

We've all witnessed the rise of hate across this country. We have a duty to stand up to it. If we don't, more lives will be lost.

The past two weeks have been devastating.

But I'm proud to be in the fight to #ProtectRoe alongside my Nevada pro-choice colleagues @RepDinaTitus @RepHorsford, @SenJackyRosen, & @SenCortezMasto.

As @RepEscobar put it: if Washington Republicans cared about families, they would have voted for the expanded child tax credit to put money in parents‚Äô pockets, for paid family leave so mothers can care for babies, & for access to affordable child care.

But they didn't. We did.

Proud to stand with my @HouseDemocrats colleagues today to #ProtectRoe.

Every single woman in this country is under attack. It doesn't matter red state or blue state ‚Äì Washington Republicans will ban abortion nationwide.

That's why we must speak up and act right now. https://t.co/SdOHJKJ2lt

Great to see Sergeant Troyce Krumme from the Las Vegas Metro Police Managers & Supervisors this week. I'm looking forward to continuing to work together on legislation to ensure local law enforcement have every resource they need to protect themselves & our communities. https://t.co/G8es43Sd21

Yesterday, we saw 100% of a political party vote against a policy that almost 70% of Americans support.

The GOP is out of line, out of touch, and out to rip away a woman's freedom to choose.

Employers are struggling to find qualified workers. Part of the problem is training.

That's why today @RepBonamici & I introduced the Community-Based Workforce Development Act to bridge the gap and bring workers, educators, and businesses together to create training programs.

We've got 300 sunny days a year. Let's keep putting them to work and invest in solar solutions for our future.
